snippet.title: GraFi Halloween Trailer
snippet.description:
This game on Steam store: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1172660/GraFi_Halloween

This game on Itch.io store: https://blender-games.itch.io/grafi-halloween

GraFi Halloween - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, Jack-O'-Lantern's, Spider's and changing gravity.

GraFi Halloween - casual, colorful, minimalist, physical puzzle with traps, treadmills, portals, Jack-O'-Lantern's, Spider's and changing gravity.
Player goal is to relocate blue coin, using only the change of gravity, on the blue rock and keep for some time to pass the level.


In GraFi Halloween:

- Traps
- Changing gravity
- Cool Soundtrack
- Achievements
- Halloween art
- Treadmills
- Portal's
- Spider's
- Jack-O'-Lantern's
- 50 levels

Subscribe to our social networks:

¤ Our group on Steam: https://steamcommunity.com/groups/BlenderGames

¤ YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvHzKFgdeYsySm_ieEGPFcA

¤ Twitter: https://twitter.com/blender_games

¤ Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/BlenderGames

¤ Twitch: https://www.twitch.tv/blendergamez

¤ Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/blender_games

¤ TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@blender_games 

¤ Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/blendergames
